name: Anda Maghaz Masala Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Anda Maghaz Masala Recipe: Eggs 8 Milk 1-1/2cup Onion finely cut 2 Ginger garlic paste 1tbsp Tomatoes (boiled, chopped) 4 Salt as per taste Red chili powder 2tsp Turmeric 3/4tsp All spices powder 3/4tsp Dried fenugreek leaves 1tsp Chaat masala 3/4tsp Oil 3/4cup Green coriander 1/2bunch Green chili chopped 3-4 Red chili chopped 3/4tsp Carom seeds 2pinch Cream 2tbsp
instructions: Firstly beat the eggs with salt and turmeric and mix it with milk. Now heat the oil and cook the eggs mixture at medium flame till it gets set. Now fry onions. Now in it add ginger garlic paste, boiled chopped tomatoes, salt Now add red chili powder and turmeric to roast the spices. Now in it add dried fenugreek leaves, chaat masala Add green coriander, cream and green chili chopped to mix. After that add eggs and stirl gradually and simmer it for 3mins. Lastly dish it out and garnish it with green coriander and green chili to serve.
